KPIBag.QueryString: SELECT C.BaseEquipmentName,COUNT(C.BaseEquipmentId) FROM TBL_Equipment A LEFT JOIN TBL_EquipmentTemplate B ON A.EquipmentTemplateId = B.EquipmentTemplateId LEFT JOIN TBL_EquipmentBaseType C ON B.EquipmentBaseType = C.BaseEquipmentId GROUP BY C.BaseEquipmentId;
SELECT AssetType,COUNT(AssetType) FROM TBL_Assetsmanager GROUP BY AssetType;
SELECT AssetsName,AssetType FROM TBL_AssetsManager ORDER BY AssetType,AssetsId;
